semantic_identifier: [GOLD-24]: Persist and surface selected calibration outcome in fit model artifacts + scoring API
title: Persist and surface selected calibration outcome in fit model artifacts + scoring API

sections.text: Ensure the calibration pipeline stores the user-selected outcome (activation/retention/expansion) and label rule metadata on the trained model artifact/version, and that online/offline scoring reads from the correct calibrated model version. Update the fit score/segment endpoints to return the calibrated outcome metadata so downstream UI/reporting can’t misinterpret what the fit score is optimized for. Add a regression test that verifies scoring responses include the correct outcome after recalibration.
